column4: Hi, I just installed Dapper on my Thinkpad. I'm trying to apt-get kde but everything has frozen. It's stopped at "Unpacking klipper". There is no mouse. What do I do?
Nothing happens on crtl+alt+f1 or del
I would suggest logging in from your other computer and running 'sudo init 0'
I'm at a friends house and only have one internet connection. No hub or switch
